FilterItemPortable.Name: Processos de hoje
FilterItemPortable.ConditionsContent: <ArrayOfFilterCondition xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <FilterCondition Index="1" FieldName="SITUACAO"> <TableName xsi:nil="true" /> <FieldDefinitionName>ListFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>igual</Name> <DatabaseOperator>=</DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> </Operator> <Value xsi:type="ArrayOfListItem" /> <Label /> <UserInputRequired>true</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> <ParameterCollection /> </FilterCondition> <FilterCondition Index="2"> <TableName xsi:nil="true" /> <Value xsi:type="xsd:string">COALESCE(A.CRIADOEM, A.INICIO) >= @HOJE AND COALESCE(A.CRIADOEM, A.INICIO) < @HOJE+1</Value> <Label xsi:nil="true" /> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>true</IsManuallyDefined> </FilterCondition> </ArrayOfFilterCondition>
FilterItemPortable.WhereClauseContent: <WhereClause xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <Where>1=1 AND COALESCE(A.CRIADOEM, A.INICIO) >= @HOJE AND COALESCE(A.CRIADOEM, A.INICIO) < @HOJE+1</Where> <Parameters /> </WhereClause>
